nl.esciencecenter.octopus

Class OctopusFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • nl.esciencecenter.octopus.OctopusFactory

  • public final class OctopusFactory
extends Object
    OctopusFactory is used to create and end Octopus instances.
    Since:
    1.0
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Jason Maassen

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void endAll()
      End all Octopus created by this factory.
      static void endOctopus(Octopus octopus)
      Ends an Octopus.
      static Octopus newOctopus(Map<String,String> properties)
      Create a new Octopus using the given properties.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • newOctopus

        public static Octopus newOctopus(Map<String,String> properties)
                          throws OctopusException,
                                 OctopusIOException
        Create a new Octopus using the given properties. The properties provided will be passed to the octopus and its adaptors on creation time. Note that an OctopusException will be thrown if properties contains any unknown keys.
        Parameters:
        properties - (optional) properties used to configure the newly created octopus.
        Returns:
        a new Octopus instance.
        Throws:
        UnknownPropertyException - If an unknown property was passed.
        InvalidPropertyException - If a known property was passed with an illegal value.
        OctopusException - If the Octopus failed initialize.
        OctopusIOException - If an I/O error occurred.

      • endOctopus

        public static void endOctopus(Octopus octopus)
                       throws OctopusException
        Ends an Octopus. Ending an Octopus will automatically close local resources, such as Schedulers, FileSystems and Credentials. In addition, all non online Jobs it has creates will be killed (for example jobs that run locally).
        Parameters:
        octopus - the octopus to end.
        Throws:
        NoSuchOctopusException - If the Octopus was not found
        OctopusException - If the Octopus failed to end.

      • endAll

        public static void endAll()
        End all Octopus created by this factory. All exceptions throw during endAll are ignored.
